title: Best of The Herd: 09/19/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 09/19/2019
description:
Colin thinks Baker Mayfield was distracted in the off-season filming too many commercials and that is why he has struggled in his first two games of 2019. He says the Patriots were more disrespectful to Tom Brady than the Giants were to Eli Manning. Plus, Greg Cosell of NFL Films breaks down Dak Prescott's early season success and what the Saints and Steelers will do different;y with their HOF QBs out with injuries.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
